name: Cool Your Balls In Space 3D
description:
It's like minigolf... IN SPACE... IN 3D!

Made for LITTLE AWFUL JAM 2016

If the embed Unity WebGL build doesn't work there's a Windows build download below.

used assets:

  • Passing by Doxent Zsigmond - http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/doxent/49489
  • Icy Blue on Lake Superior - https://www.flickr.com/photos/travelgardeneat/12995737154/
  • Space Skybox Clouds - https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/52928
